I am not an expert in simulation so I trust you judgement to keep both behavior (with and without zeroing the twist) but I do not see how to handle it.
In fact, the MoveFrame function is only called in Joint::SetPositionMaximal in physics/Joint.cc

When do you want to activate or deactivate zeroing the twist ?
Because I see a single use case : calling Joint::SetPosition
